definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: It was designed as "a real-world, highly sophisticated trading atmosphere."
sentences.chinese: 那是“真实复杂的交易氛围。”

sentences.english: W2: The exciting atmosphere of change and development.
sentences.chinese: 那令人振奋的巨变和发展氛围。

sentences.english: It has landscaped grounds have an open and quiet ambience.
sentences.chinese: 它具有开放的花木场宁静氛围。

sentences.english: I like big manor, likes to easy life, where the fresh air is relaxing.
sentences.chinese: 我喜好大庄园，那边的氛围新颖让人抓紧。

sentences.english: In former times the typical "royal" horse shoe shapes have been built to serve the needs of the political surrounding.
sentences.chinese: 近代所流行的马蹄型就是为了适应政治氛围的需求。

sentences.english: New Mother Town is expected to help ABP create a homelike atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 新母城为总部基地营造家一般的发展氛围。

sentences.english: The love which my parents gave me , or the lovely family I am having.
sentences.chinese: 父母从小对我无私的痛爱，他们的和谐家庭氛围。

sentences.english: It is Huiying's unremitting pursuit to construct a harmonious and coexistent atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 构建和谐共处的企业氛围是汇英人不懈的追求。

sentences.english: The atmosphere on an inpatient ward is tense because of this exerted energy.
sentences.chinese: 由于这种表露的干劲，住院病房的氛围很紧张。

sentences.english: In such an atmosphere of mistrust, miscalculation rules on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 在如此互不信任的氛围下，双方都有失算。

sentences.english: " The whole space exerts all efforts on building the "self-pleasing" living atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 整个空间全力营造“赏心悦己”的居住氛围。

sentences.english: Powerful brand city, to spare no effort to create a good atmosphere of brand and market.
sentences.chinese: 实施品牌强市，要全力营造争创品牌市场的良好氛围。

sentences.english: Aircraft interiors also reflected this fashionable period and contributed to the allure of air travel.
sentences.chinese: 飞机内部也反映出这种时尚的氛围和空中旅行的魅力。

sentences.english: Fourth, we should develop the atmosphere of "attack against sinister gangs" in the whole society.
sentences.chinese: 四是在全社会形成“打黑除恶”的氛围。

sentences.english: eye-opening experiences compared to the atmosphere of the other institution.
sentences.chinese: 与其他大学比起来，这里的氛围使人大开眼界。

sentences.english: Lastly, build the social environment of national equality and unity in the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 最后，国家范围内民族平等团结氛围的营造。

definition: background (of a painting)/backdrop/a foil (to set off something to advantage)/to offset (something to advantage)
dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
